occur naturally in 1 in 10,000 
pregnancies and quads are 
even rarer. Nowadays, the use 
of treatments such as in vitro

Are you carrying twins?
You might suspect that you 
are carrying more than one 
baby if:
• you are very sick in early 
pregnancy;
• you seem bigger than you 
should be for your ‘dates’;
• you have had fertility 
treatment.
It	is	usually	possible	to	find	
out through your dating
